footer.description: A collective curation platform for YouTube videos. Preserving and discovering valuable content together.

hero.description: A community dedicated to preserving and sharing the best YouTube videos. Old tutorials, traditional recipes, iconic memes, and more.

auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Log in
auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to the terms of use and privacy policy.

error.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before logging in
error.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
error.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
error.genericAuthError: An authentication error occurred. Please try again.

success.confirmEmail: Check your email to confirm your registration
success.checkEmailForReset: Check your inbox for the password reset link.

submit.title: Submit Video
submit.description: Share an interesting YouTube video with the community
submit.previewPlaceholder: Paste a YouTube URL to see the preview
submit.tip1: Unique and interesting videos are more valued
submit.tip2: Choose the correct category to facilitate discovery
submit.tip3: Add a description explaining why the video is special

error.invalidUrlDescription: Please enter a valid YouTube URL
error.notLoggedInDescription: You need to be logged in to submit videos
error.videoExistsDescription: This video has already been submitted by another user
error.genericSubmitDescription: An error occurred while submitting the video. Please try again.
error.aiEnrichmentFailedDescription: Failed to start AI enrichment for the video.

success.videoSubmittedDescription: Your video has been successfully added to the collection

info.aiEnrichmentStartedDescription: AI is now processing the video metadata for enrichment.

videos.title: Explore Videos
videos.description: Find videos by search, category, or language.
videos.noVideosFound: No videos found with the search criteria.

videoDetails.videoNotFoundDescription: The video you are looking for may not exist or have been removed.
videoDetails.noDescription: No description provided for this video.
videoDetails.favoriteInfo: You need to be logged in to favorite videos.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.description: All the videos you've saved to watch later.

favorites.noFavoritesDescription: Start exploring and save your favorite videos!

index.noRecentVideos: No recent videos yet. Be the first to submit!
index.ctaTitle: Know a video that deserves to be preserved?
index.ctaDescription: Share with the community and help build the largest archive of valuable videos on the internet.

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect with other curators and video enthusiasts.

playlists.title: Playlists
playlists.description: Curated learning paths and video collections.
playlists.noPlaylistsDescription: Be the first to create a playlist and organize knowledge!
playlists.loadingErrorDescription: Could not load playlists. Please try again later.

playlistDetails.notFoundDescription: The playlist you are looking for may not exist or have been removed.
playlistDetails.noDescription: No description provided for this playlist.
playlistDetails.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the '{{playlistName}}' playlist and all its associated videos.
playlistDetails.noVideosTitle: No videos in this playlist yet.
playlistDetails.noVideosDescription: Add videos to start building your learning path!
playlistDetails.addVideoPrompt: Add/reorder videos functionality will be implemented soon!

createEditPlaylist.createDescription: Organize videos into coherent learning paths.
createEditPlaylist.editDescription: Update the details of your playlist.
createEditPlaylist.loadErrorDescription: Could not load playlist details. Please try again later.

form.slugHint: A unique identifier for the URL (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only).
form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this playlist covers.
form.courseCodeHint: The course code this playlist belongs to (optional).
form.unitCodeHint: The unit code within the course (optional).
form.isPublicHint: Public playlists are visible to all users.
